title: 2 recent typefaces used by Urban Outfitters
content:
Ok, I have a thing for Urban's type choices. I always love them and I can never figure out what they are! Here are two recent ones that I'd love to get ID'ed!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/soft_5331.jpg)
  
&  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/shop_4352.jpg)

Let me hear what you think!
author: toog

comments.content:
Top one is Din Light. (Great album BTW)

Nick Cooke

Can't believe that's Din! Also, what foundry makes that, as my Din has no "light" just long German words to describe weights. Thanks!

Anyone know #2? What an "S"!
